C

Cart - Class in logic
This class represents the cart - will show the products that the client chose to buy, and the relevant info about them.
Cart(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class logic.Cart
This method is the constructor for Cart
changeStatusToDoneForDelivery(String) - Static method in class server.mysqlConnection
This method updates the status of a certain delivery to "done" in the data base.
ChatIF - Interface in common
This interface implements the abstract method used to display objects onto the client or server UIs.
checkExistsSaleInProduct(String, String) - Static method in class server.mysqlConnection
This method checks if there is a sale on a certain product in a certain area.
checkForLogin(String, String) - Static method in class server.mysqlConnection
This method gets a user's user name and password, checks if these are the correct values (according to the information in the data base), and checks if the user is not already logged in to the system.
checkIfThereIsReport(String) - Static method in class server.mysqlConnection
This method makes sure that no report is generated more than once.
checkProductQuantity(String, String) - Static method in class server.mysqlConnection
This method check the quantity of a certain product in the chosen facility.
checktShowReports(String, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class server.mysqlConnection
This method gets the information about the different reports.
CLIENT_CONNECTED - Static variable in class ocsf.server.ObservableServer
The string sent to the observers when a client has connected.
CLIENT_DISCONNECTED - Static variable in class ocsf.server.ObservableServer
The string sent to the observers when a client has disconnected.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION - Static variable in class ocsf.server.ObservableServer
The string sent to the observers when an exception occurred with a client.
Clients - Class in logic
This class holds all the information about a client in the system.
Clients(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class logic.Clients
This method is the constructor for Clients
close() - Method in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
Closes the server socket and the connections with all clients.
close() - Method in class ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient
Closes the client.
close() - Method in class ocsf.server.ObservableServer
Closes the server's connections with all clients.
common - package common
 
ConnectDb(String[]) - Static method in class server.mysqlConnection
 
ConnectionToClient - Class in ocsf.server
An instance of this class is created by the server when a client connects.
controller - package controller
 
CreateAccount(String) - Static method in class server.mysqlConnection
This method creates a client account for a user.
createDeliveryOrder() - Static method in class server.mysqlConnection
This method generates the data for the monthly delivery report each month.
createOrderReport() - Static method in class server.mysqlConnection
This method generates the data for the monthly orders report each month.
